name: The Cult of SuDIEku
description:
Oh no! The Cult of SuDIEku has angered their god, and only solving its puzzle can save them. Will you help? Solve the sudoku by dying in the correct way.

My first game ever, made for the Newbies Game Jam. According to Wikipedia, a sudoku is a tabletop game, so yes, it does satisfy the optional genre "tabletop platformer".
